page.title: 19Inverkeithing road works
page.content:
A new{roundabout}has just been completed at the west entrance to Dalgety Bay,{traffic lights}at a problem junction to the east of Inverkeithing, which now both relieve conjestion, especially on Fridays when the factories at{Donibristle.}Now a new roundabout is being built at the west junction to{Inverkeithing,}which was a very bad junction previously. Another issue is the{Hillend {Bypass.}
Something which is less important than this perhaps, is the lack of things to do in Dalgety Bay for young people. It is fine if you grow rhubarb or paint pictures but if you are almost normal there is very little to do out of school. You must travel to Dunfermline, Kirkcaldy or even Edinburgh !
